game.name: Santa Run
game.description:
Christmas is just approaching the winter season! Like all the previous year celebrations, this year you also expect to get the awesome gifts from Santa. However, it looks like Father Christmas got late due to being stopped by some evil souls. Now he has to collect the gifts along with the candy canes while overcoming different obstacles. Would you help him out? Join Santa Run and be prepared to make Santa Claus run without being caught by any of his enemies on the way!

The entire path is full of awesome gifts that are supposed to get collected by Santa on time. Be careful and try to make him jump timely over the obstacles as you will have only three lives to use! Track how much lives are left by looking at the top left corner of the screen and you can also know your present score by keeping your eyes on the top right corner of the screen. Defeat the monsters before moving forward in this HTML5 running game!

When your game finishes, best score will also be shown on the bottom of the screen. Hurry up, friends! Try to grab as much gifts as you can to help him make his children surprise on the evening of Christmas! Hope you find this free Christmas game filled with lots new challenges and fun opportunities! You can try it as many times as you can to keep you busy until the evening of the celebration comes. Try out other more popular and latest Christmas running games on our website and have a blast with your friends, no download required!
game.metaTitle: Santa Run Game, Running - Play Online Free Games : Atmegame.com
game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Santa Run at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!
game.metaKeyword: Santa Run, Play Free Games, Play Online Free Games
game.mobileControlKeys: RIGHT ICONS TO HIT BTY BAG AND STONE, LEFT ICON TO JUMP
game.webControlKeys: SPACE/ RIGHT ICON TO HIT WITH STONE, OR BAG ICON TO HIT WITH BAG, UP ARROW OR LEFT JUMP ICON TO JUMP
